attributes.action: Tax all companies who use 'junk mail' as the environmental costs of junk mail are currently paid for by the tax payers of this country and not the companies causing all the resultant land fill
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The mailing preference system just does not work, all the companies that are supposed to abide by it, simply do not do so or use rediculous timescales to remove a person from the mailing lists. The environmental and financial costs to this country as a result are disgusting. The taxation of this industry will reduce the amount of land fill sites needed around the country

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "Tax all companies who use 'junk mail' as the environmental costs of junk mail are currently paid for by the tax payers of this country and not the companies causing all the resultant land fill."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.pm.gov.uk/output/Page14162.asp
